updatedb /etc/cron.daily/mlocate

Post.title: ubuntuphp
Post._content:
``` bash

./configure prefix=/usr/local/php with-config-file-path=/etc \
with-mysql=/usr/local/mysql with-mysqli=/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql_config \
with-iconv-dir=/usr/local with-freetype-dir with-jpeg-dir
with-png-dir with-zlib with-libxml-dir=/usr enable-xml \
disable-rpath enable-safe-mode enable-bcmath enable-shmop \
enable-sysvsem enable-inline-optimization with-curl \
with-curlwrappers enable-mbregex enable-fpm enable-mbstring \
with-mcrypt with-gd enable-gd-native-ttf with-openssl \
with-mhash enable-pcntl enable-sockets with-xmlrpc \
enable-zip  enable-soap

```



configure: error: xml2-config not found. Please check your libxml2 installation.
libxml2,

```bash
sudo apt-get install libxml2-dev
```


configure: error: Please reinstall the BZip2 distribution
bzip2bzip2-dev11.10
bzip2-1.0.5.tar.gzmake ,sudo make install.(http://ishare.iask.sina.com.cn/f/9769001.html)


configure: error: Please reinstall the libcurl distribution -easy.h should be in /include/curl/

```bash
sudo apt-get install libcurl4-gnutls-dev
```


configure: error: jpeglib.h not found.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libjpeg-dev
```


configure: error: png.h not found.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libpng-dev
```


configure: error: libXpm.(a|so) not found.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libxpm-dev
```


configure: error: freetype.h not found.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libfreetype6-dev
```


configure: error: Your t1lib distribution is not installed correctly. Please reinstall it.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libt1-dev
```


configure: error: mcrypt.h not found. Please reinstall libmcrypt.

```bash
sudo apt-get install libmcrypt-dev
```


configure: error: Cannot find MySQL header files under yes.
Note that the MySQL client library is not bundled anymore!

```sh
sudo apt-get install libmysql++-dev
```


configure: error: xslt-config not found. Please reinstall the libxslt >= 1.1.0 distribution

```bash
sudo apt-get install libxslt1-dev
```

PHPhttp://forum.ubuntu.org.cn/viewtopic.php?f=88&t=231159
./config.
```
make
sudo make install
```

Post.title: UUID
Post.author: Bin
Post._content:
# UUID?

UUID(Universally Unique Identifier),(OSF)ID(UUIDUUIDUUID)IEEEUUID

# UUID
``` bash
sudo blkid /dev/sda1

output: 
/dev/sda1: UUID="7db6e2b8-6821-476e-8dc5-00ab84bd636e" TYPE="ext2"
```

RFC http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt

tags:

    - UUID
---


Post.title: Nginx fastcgi cache
Post.subtitle: The Next Generation Application Model For The Web - Progressive Web App
Post.author: Hux
Post._content:
# 

## fastcgi_cache_path
> syntax: fastcgi_cache_path path [ levels = levels ] keys_zone = name : size [ inactive = time ] [ max_size = size ] [ loader_files = number ] [ > loader_sleep = time ] [ loader_threshold = time ]
> default: none
> context: http

```nginx
fastcgi_cache_path /dev/shm/nginx_cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=fcgicache:10m inactive=50m max_size=128m;
```
* /tmp/nginx/fcgi/cache 
* keys_zone=fcgicache:10m keys_zone10mkey,fastcgi_cache
* levels=1:2 2:2256*256
* inactive 
* max_size 


## fastcgi_temp_path
> Syntax:	fastcgi_temp_path path [ level1 [ level2 [ level3 ]]]
> Default:	fastcgi_temp
> Context:	http server location

fastcgi_cachefastcgi_cachefastcgi_temp_pathfastcgi_cache_path0.8.9


## fastcgi_cache
> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache zone | off;
> Default: off;
> Context:	http, server, location

fastcgi_cache_path

``` nginx
fastcgi_cache fcgicache;
```

> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_key string;
> Default:	
> Context:	http, server, location

key
```nginx
fastcgi_cache_key "$scheme$request_method$host$request_uri";
```
httpserverlocation


## fastcgi_cache_methods
> Syntax:	  fastcgi_cache_methods GET | HEAD | POST ...;
> Default:  GET HEAD;
> Context:  http, server, location



## fastcgi_cache_min_uses

> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_min_uses number;
> Default:  1;
> Context:	http, server, location



## fastcgi_cache_use_stale
> syntax: fastcgi_cache_use_stale [error | timeout | invalid_header | updating | http_500 | http_503 | http_403 | http_404 | off]
> default: fastcgi_cache_use_stale off;
> context: http, server, location


```nginx
fastcgi_cache_use_stale error timeout invalid_header http_500 http_503 updating;
```

## fastcgi_cache_valid
> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_valid [code ...] time;
> Default:	
> Context:	http, server, location


```nginx
fastcgi_cache_valid 200 302  10m;
fastcgi_cache_valid 301      1h;
fastcgi_cache_valid any      1m;
fastcgi_cache_valid 1m;  # fastcgi_cache_valid 200 301 302 1m;
```


# 



* X-Accel-Expires@
* X-Accel-ExpiresExpiresCache-Control
* Set-Cookie
* Vary *1.7.7Vary1.7.7

# 


* Nginx fastcgi_cachefastcgiset-cookie;
* Expiresnginx_cache;
* Cache-ControlCache-Controlno-cacheno-storeprivate
* Vary * (1.7.7)

fastcgi_ignore_headers

```nginx
fastcgi_ignore_headers Expires Cache-Control;
fastcgi_ignore_headers Set-Cookie; #cookie,session
```

# 

``` nginx
http{
  #...
  fastcgi_cache_path /dev/shm/nginx_cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=fcgicache:10m inactive=30m max_size=128m;
  fastcgi_cache_key  "$scheme$request_method$host$request_uri";
  fastcgi_temp_path  /dev/shm/nginx_tmp;
  #...

  server{
    #...
    location ~ \.php($|/) {
        #...
        fastcgi_cache fcgicache; #
        fastcgi_cache_valid 1m; #200 301 3021
        fastcgi_cache_valid 404 500 502 503 504 0s; #404 500 502 503 504
        fastcgi_cache_valid any 3h; #3
        fastcgi_cache_min_uses 1; #
        fastcgi_cache_use_stale error timeout invalid_header http_500 http_503 updating; #
        fastcgi_ignore_headers Expires Cache-Control; #Expires Cache-Control
        #...
    }
    #...
  }
}
```

# 

* $upstream_response_time
* $upstream_cache_status cache

## 
|||
|----|---|
| MISS |  |
| EXPIRED | expired, request was passed to backend Cache |
| UPDATING | expired, stale response was used due to proxy/fastcgi_cache_use_stale updating Cache(nginx) |
| STALE | expired, stale response was used due to proxy/fastcgi_cache_use_stale CacheHIT cache |


# PHP


``` php
header("Expires: ".gmdate("D, d M Y H:i:s", time()+10000).' GMT');
header("Expires: ".gmdate("D, d M Y H:i:s", time()-99999).' GMT');
header("X-Accel-Expires:5"); // 5s
header("Cache-Control: no-cache"); //no cache
header("Cache-Control: no-store"); //no cache
header("Cache-Control: private"); //no cache
header("Cache-Control: max-age=10"); //cache 10s
setcookie('hello',"testaaaa"); //no cache
echo date("Y-m-d H:i:s",time());
exit;
```

session_startphpsessionsession.cache_limitExpiresheadernocachephp.inisession.cache_limitnonesessionhttp session_startsession_cache_limitersessionExpiresCache-Controlhttp response headersessioncachenginxCache-Controlcache  


session_start 

``` php
session_cache_limiter("none");
session_start();
echo date("Y-m-d H:i:s",time());
exit;
```

---
layout:     post
title:      "Nginx fastcgi cache"
subtitle:   "The Next Generation Application Model For The Web - Progressive Web App"
date:       2017-02-28
author:     "Hux"
header-img: "img/post-bg-nextgen-web-pwa.jpg"
header-mask: 1
catalog:    true
tags:
    - nginx
    - cache
---
# 

## fastcgi_cache_path
> syntax: fastcgi_cache_path path [ levels = levels ] keys_zone = name : size [ inactive = time ] [ max_size = size ] [ loader_files = number ] [ > loader_sleep = time ] [ loader_threshold = time ]
> default: none
> context: http

```nginx
fastcgi_cache_path /dev/shm/nginx_cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=fcgicache:10m inactive=50m max_size=128m;
```
* /tmp/nginx/fcgi/cache 
* keys_zone=fcgicache:10m keys_zone10mkey,fastcgi_cache
* levels=1:2 2:2256*256
* inactive 
* max_size 


## fastcgi_temp_path
> Syntax:	fastcgi_temp_path path [ level1 [ level2 [ level3 ]]]
> Default:	fastcgi_temp
> Context:	http server location

fastcgi_cachefastcgi_cachefastcgi_temp_pathfastcgi_cache_path0.8.9


## fastcgi_cache
> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache zone | off;
> Default: off;
> Context:	http, server, location

fastcgi_cache_path

``` nginx
fastcgi_cache fcgicache;
```

> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_key string;
> Default:	
> Context:	http, server, location

key
```nginx
fastcgi_cache_key "$scheme$request_method$host$request_uri";
```
httpserverlocation


## fastcgi_cache_methods
> Syntax:	  fastcgi_cache_methods GET | HEAD | POST ...;
> Default:  GET HEAD;
> Context:  http, server, location



## fastcgi_cache_min_uses

> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_min_uses number;
> Default:  1;
> Context:	http, server, location



## fastcgi_cache_use_stale
> syntax: fastcgi_cache_use_stale [error | timeout | invalid_header | updating | http_500 | http_503 | http_403 | http_404 | off]
> default: fastcgi_cache_use_stale off;
> context: http, server, location


```nginx
fastcgi_cache_use_stale error timeout invalid_header http_500 http_503 updating;
```

## fastcgi_cache_valid
> Syntax:	fastcgi_cache_valid [code ...] time;
> Default:	
> Context:	http, server, location


```nginx
fastcgi_cache_valid 200 302  10m;
fastcgi_cache_valid 301      1h;
fastcgi_cache_valid any      1m;
fastcgi_cache_valid 1m;  # fastcgi_cache_valid 200 301 302 1m;
```

``` nginx
  fastcgi_cache_key  "$scheme$request_method$host$request_uri";
  fastcgi_temp_path  /dev/shm/nginx_tmp;
  #...

        #...
```

Post.title: Steem dbadmin
Post._content:
# 
dbadminsteemRuby on Rails, activeadminsteem

* dbadmin https://github.com/steemit/dbadmin 
* activeadmin https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin

# 

## rvm

``` bash
gpg --keyserver hkp://keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 409B6B1796C275462A1703113804BB82D39DC0E3 7D2BAF1CF37B13E2069D6956105BD0E739499BDB
\curl -sSL https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable
```

## ruby
ruby2.3.1
```
source ~/.rvm/scripts/rvm
rvm install 2.3.1
```

## Rails
``` bash
gem install bundler
gem install rails
```

## dbadmin
``` bash
git clone https://github.com/steemit/dbadmin
cd dbadmin

# 
bundle install
```

### 
app/config/database.yml

```
development:
  <<: *default
  host: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
  username: xxx
  password: xxx
  port: xxx
```

### 

``` bash
rake db:migrate RAILS_ENV=development
rake db:seed
```

### 
``` bash
bundle exec unicorn -c config/unicorn.rb -d -E development
```

#
http://127.0.0.1:5000/

admin@example.com
password

![](/uploads/dbadmin_dashboard.png)


# 

## GeoLite2-City.mmdb


```
dbadmin/app/models/user.rb:6:in `initialize': GeoIP2Compat - Error opening the specified MaxMind DB file: /xxx/dbadmin/GeoLite2-City.mmdb (GeoIP2Compat::Error)
```
http://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLite2-City.tar.gz
dbadmin/GeoLite2-City.mmdb

##  libmysqlclient.18.dylib


```
/xxx/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.1/gems/mysql2-0.4.4/lib/mysql2.rb:31:in `require': dlopen(/xxx/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.1/gems/mysql2-0.4.4/lib/mysql2/mysql2.bundle, 9): Library not loaded: libmysqlclient.18.dylib  (LoadError)
```


```
sudo ln -s /usr/local/mysql/lib/libmysqlclient.18.dylib /usr/lib/libmysqlclient.18.dylib
```

mac, Operation not permittedRootless

 Command+RTerminal

```
csrutil disable
```



```
csrutil enable
```

## srcprintfcpp

```bash
grep src/*.cpp -e printf | cut -d ':' -f1 | uniq
```

## (
```bash
ls -l | sed '1d' | sort -n -k5 | awk '{printf "%15s %10s\n", $9,$5}'
```
